overview: Golam is a lonely man who comes back to Porto Cristo (Mallorca) after a while - As soon as he arrives he is shocked when he discovers that a criminal gang called "La Banda del Lobo" (The Gang of the Wolf) has taken over the place. People are in fear as the gang is terrorizing the population thanks to authorities' complicity and law enforcement's inactivity. But he'll do "Jostice".
title: Jostissi de Carreró
